DanielG.views.home module

class DanielG.views.home.Index(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: View

get(request)[source]

The get method gets the product path

Parameters:

  • self – First parameter to the Instance method. The instance is called onto itself with the request parameter.

  • request – Second required parameter to send HTTP requests.

post(request)[source]

The post method is used to get the input from the user from the home page. This is choosing the product they want to buy, adding to cart or removing from cart.

param self:

First parameter to the Instance method. The instance is called onto itself with the request parameter.

param request:

Second required parameter to send HTTP requests.

retruns:

Redirects to home page

DanielG.views.login module

class DanielG.views.login.Login(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: View

get(request)[source]

The get methods renders the login page

Parameters:

  • self – First parameter to the Instance method. The instance is called onto itself with the request parameter.

  • request – Second required parameter to send HTTP requests.

Returns:

renders login.html

post(request)[source]

The post method is where the login is processed and validated. In the html file POST is used to get the user input and validate it.

Parameters:

  • self – First parameter to the Instance method. The instance is called onto itself with the request parameter.

  • request – Second required parameter to send HTTP requests.

Returns:

Redirects to home page if succesfully logged in, else if error in login details reset login page with error message

return_url = None
DanielG.views.login.logout(request)[source]

The logout method is used to logout the user when the user chooses to logout

Parameters:

request – required parameter to send HTTP requests.

Returns:

Redirects back to login page

This is the signup class that will contain the methods for registering

The get method is used to render the signup html file

Parameters:

  • request – Second required parameter to send HTTP requests.

Returns:

Renders signup.html

post(request)[source]

The post method is where the registration is processed and validated. In the html file POST is used to get the user input and validate it.

Parameters:

  • self – First parameter to the Instance method. The instance is called onto itself with the request parameter.

  • request – Second required parameter to send HTTP requests.

Returns:

Redirects to home page if succesfully signed up, else if error reset signup page

validateCustomer(customer)[source]

The function is used to validate the input of the user and check if the user doesn’t already exist

Parameters:

  • self – First parameter to the Instance method. The instance is called onto itself with the request parameter.

  • request – Second required parameter to send HTTP requests.

Returns:
